pullRequest.body:
In this PR, we show the existence of colimits in categories of sheaves of modules, apply this to the particular case of coproducts of copies of the sheaf of rings in order to formalize the notion of generating family of (global) sections of a sheaf of modules.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your

GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion /-- Given `F : Sheaf J A` and `X; C`, this is the pullback of `F` on `J.over X`. -/ ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion Ïƒ.ofEpi (p â‰« q) = (Ïƒ.ofEpi p).ofEpi q := rfl ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion Ïƒ.ofEpi (p â‰« q) = (Ïƒ.ofEpi p).ofEpi q := rfl ```
Can we package this as an adjunction? (maybe TODO)
Thanks for the suggestion. I have extended the API a little bit, but we cannot directly make it an adjunction because `M.sections` may be in a different universe than `I`. I have added a TODO anyway.
Ah, not in this PR :-(, but it shall be used in #13464.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: sheaves of modules generated by their sections
